data.name: Hanson Ye and Jimmy McWhinney
data.value: 叶海生和Jimmy McWhinney

data.name: ISSUE 13
data.value: 第13期

data.name: AUTUMN 2019
data.value: 2019年秋季刊

data.name: 'During the day, I would look for odd jobs, and someone brought me to the Renewal Center. Before then, I didn't have a place to get cleaned up. I was filthy! I had absolutely no hope or direction.' It's the same story for many young men who come to Shanghai looking for work. When the dream job doesn't materialize, the downward spiral begins.
data.value: “白天，我会找一些零工，然后有人把我带到了日新中心。在那之前，我没办法保持干净。全身脏兮兮的，让我非常自卑，感到没有希望。”事实上，许多前来上海找工作的年轻人都会遇到同样的麻烦。一旦没有找到梦想中的好工作，厄运就会接连到来。

data.name: 'I originally came to Shanghai to look for work. But I didn't find a job ... so at night I would sleep on the Nanjing East Road,' says Meng Jia'ou, who grew up in a poor rural area in Guangxi province in southern China.
data.value: “我刚来到上海时想要找到一份工作，可惜没有成功。后来我每天晚上就睡在南京东路上。”来自广西偏远乡村的蒙加藕这样说道。

data.name: 'Thanks for sending us a great employee!'
data.value: 感谢你们送来如此出色的员工！

data.name: A tale of how your kindness is helping a homeless man deliver the goods
data.value: 您的善举帮助无家可归人士成为一名称职的快递员

data.name: At the Center, I know I can find a job with a good environment and fair wages.
data.value: 在日新中心，我知道我能找到一份环境好，报酬好的好工作。

data.name: Big thanks to you. There is really no one else who would treat people like me so well.
data.value: 真的感激你们。从来没有人曾经对我这么好过。

data.name: But this story is not only about Xu Bo. It's about you and Xu. You see, you gave Xu the time and space he needed to find the right job by sending faithful support to the Renewal Center. He and the other residents are very thankful for that kind of support, because there's really no other place in Shanghai that you could donate to that will give people like Xu Bo a chance to not only find a job, but to find the right job no matter how long it takes.
data.value: 但这并不是徐波一个人的故事，您在其中的作用也不可忽视。是您给日新中心的支持使徐波得到了找到合适工作所需的时间和资源。他和其他培训计划学员都非常感激您的支持，因为在上海，再也没有其他地方可以利用您的捐赠让徐波这样的无家可归人士有机会找到新的工作，并且是最适合他们的工作，不论这需要经历多长的时间。

data.name: Clothes make the man, you make his future
data.value: 整洁的衣服成就当下，您的支持成就未来

data.name: Every day, another new person comes to the Renewal Center hoping for a shower or something to eat, and they find so much more -- a place to train for a job that pays a decent wage. When he first arrived, Meng Jia'ou just wanted to wash off all the dirt, but he's since joined the training program on the path to a better life. 'My biggest need is career training,' he says today. 'I don't want to live on the streets anymore.'
data.value: 每一天，都会有新的无家可归者来到日新中心希望洗个澡或吃顿饱饭。此外，他们可能还能得到工作培训，从而有机会找到一份好工作。蒙加藕刚来的时候只是想要洗净身上的污垢，但自从加入了培训计划后，他开始梦想着更好的生活。“我最大的需求就是技能培训，”他说，“因为我再也不想睡在大街上了。”

data.name: For them, just getting basic healthcare seems impossible. State-subsidized medical care is available only to those with ID cards. Most homeless people don't have one and those who do often come from outside Shanghai.
data.value: 对她们而言，几乎不可能得到基本的医疗保障。只有持有身份证的人才能享受国家提供补助的医疗服务。大多数无家可归人士都没有身份证，而那些有身份证的人又大多来自外地。

data.name: Formerly homeless and jobless, Xu Bo is now an expert at ensuring any item you send in Shanghai arrives on time. But it took him a while to find a job that really suited him. After graduating from Renewal's training program Xu Bo tried working in a coffee shop, in factories, and as a security guard. But none of the jobs were right for him.
data.value: 徐波过去也是一名没有工作的无家可归者。而现在，他已经成了一名称职的快递员，保证会按时将你的包裹送达上海的任意角落。其实他在找到这份合适的工作前还是花费了不少时间。从日新中心的培训计划毕业后，徐波曾做过咖啡店店员、工厂工人和保安。但这些工作都不适合他。

data.name: Frontline services like washing machines open the door to career training
data.value: 洗衣服务开启职业培训的大门

data.name: Give meals, help and support to a homeless person and put them on the path to growth and a good job.
data.value: 给无家可归者提供食物、帮助和支持，帮他们走上正轨，找到合适的工作。

data.name: Great news. The Renewal Center's Fresh Start Cafe is making a comeback, thanks to the support of generous donors like you! Not only will earnings from the new cafe provide crucial funding to help homeless people, it will also serve as a training program where residents learn valuable food service skills and gain an opportunity to be placed in a full time job with one of our partner restaurants.
data.value: 好消息！多亏了和您一样慷慨的捐赠者的支持，日新中心的鲜也餐厅即将再次开业！餐厅的收入不仅可以提供关键的资金来帮助无家可归者，还能作为培训场所帮助我们的学员学习专业餐饮服务技术，进而有机会在我们的餐厅合作伙伴找到全职的工作。

data.name: Homeless women have crucial healthcare, thanks to you
data.value: 在您的帮助下，无家可归的女性得到了关键的医疗救护

data.name: Homeless women tend to be older than homeless men, and may have more problems. They deal with greater danger because of the greater likelihood of physical or sexual assault. Women may also be mentally and emotionally traumatized, having been abused, abandoned or thrown out of whatever home they had before.
data.value: 无家可归的女性一般比男性年龄更大，也会遇到更多困难。她们有更大的可能会受到身体和性方面的侵害。女性也更容易受到精神上的伤害、受到虐待、遗弃或从家中被赶出来。

data.name: In fact, you gave Xu the help he needed when no one else but you cared enough about him to give him the boost he needed! Likewise, he hopes he's giving you the satisfaction of knowing that your gifts helped a good man find a good job, so he can afford all the essentials of life in this amazing but challenging city.
data.value: 在没有其他人真正关心时，是您给了徐波最需要的支持。同样，他也希望能够用努力的表现让您感到欣慰：您的善举帮助一位努力的年轻人找到了合适的工作，让他得以在这个美丽但充满挑战的城市中开始新的生活。

data.name: In this issue of Re:news
data.value: 刊物内容

data.name: Inspired by your support, volunteer doctors and nurses are visiting the Renewal Center to provide healthcare to women.
data.value: 在您的善举的激励下，志愿医生和护士每月都来到日新中心为女性朋友们提供免费医疗服务。

data.name: It's one of the busiest shopping streets in the world, but when the shops close you'll find many homeless people struggling to survive...
data.value: 这是世界上最繁忙的商业街之一，但当路边的商店纷纷关门之后，你会看到许多无家可归者艰难地在这里生活。

data.name: It's part of our promise to you as a Renewal supporter -- never to place a person you helped to train into a dead-end job, and never send a valued employer a graduate trainee until they are fully skilled, ready and willing. Your support is amazing. Thank you!
data.value: 这是我们对日新中心支持者们的承诺：绝不会送一位您帮助过的学员去做一份没有前途的工作，也绝不把技术和心理还未成熟，还未做好准备的学员送给我们珍贵的就业合作伙伴。在这一过程中，您的支持是最重要的。谢谢您！

data.name: Long hours, low pay and extremely demanding bosses are an often quoted reason why young men leave work. But now that Xu's 'boss' is simply an app on his smartphone, he can decide whether or not to take a callout. Amazing how modern technology has taken the supervisor out of the picture and lets the employee answer to customers.
data.value: 工作时间长、薪水低、老板要求太多是年轻人离开一份工作时最常提到的理由。但现在，徐波的“老板”就是一个快递app和他的手机，他可以自行决定是否接单。先进的现代科技已经将管理层从服务链中剔除，使员工可以直接与客户对接。

data.name: Meng Jia'ou initially came to the Renewal Center because he was tired of feeling dirty.
data.value: 蒙加藕最初来到日新中心的原因是他想要让自己干干净净的。

data.name: My gift to train homeless people for steady work
data.value: 我为无家可归者提供培训的捐赠

data.name: One doctor even asked one of the women to show that dancing can be great exercise and found herself impressed by her fancy footwork!
data.value: 一名医生还告诉一位无家可归的女性跳舞是非常好的锻炼方式，并被后者优美的步法所打动。

data.name: Renewal employment partner Element Fresh reports that the new employees you help to train are among their most skilled and hard working. Renewal trainee graduate Yao Han took a job with Element Fresh after completing the training program and finding it impossible to land a good job back in his home town. 'I started a few jobs, but they weren't good. I never knew what to expect and the bosses always tried to take advantage. At the Center, I know I can find a job with a good environment and fair wages.'
data.value: 日新中心的就业合作伙伴新元素餐厅告诉我们，您帮助培训的这些学员在他们的员工里是技术最好，工作最努力的。从日新中心培训项目毕业的学员姚瀚在来到新元素工作前，曾经在他的家乡很难找到好工作。“我做过几份工作，但没有一份是好的。那时候，我都不知道会发生什么，我的老板总是想要占便宜。而在日新中心，我知道我能找到一份环境好，报酬好的好工作。”

data.name: Renewal residents cook up new careers
data.value: 为日新中心学员创造新的就业机会

data.name: Since 2016, the stoves, ovens, tables, chairs, and even lighting and wiring has been safely stored, waiting for they day we found a new location. And I'm pleased to announce that day has come. The new site in downtown Shanghai will give the Renewal Center a foothold in the city center, where your giving can be even more effective in spotting the talents of homeless people who just need training. Thanks again for helping provide the resource they need to launch a lasting career!
data.value: 从2016年以来，鲜也餐厅的炉灶、烤箱、桌椅，甚至灯具和电线等设备就一直被妥善保存着，等着我们找到新的地址。而现在，我可以高兴地宣布，这一天终于到来了！位于上海市中心的新店址成了日新中心新的立足点，将有利于使您的捐赠更有效地发现无家可归人士中的人才，并给他们提供培训机会。再次感谢您为他们提供的开启新的职业生涯的宝贵资源。

data.name: So a homeless woman has to pay to see a doctor -- full price, in advance, and even in a life-threatening emergency. The result is that those who can't even afford decent meals or clean clothes never get medical attention at all.
data.value: 所以无家可归的女性要想看医生，必须提前支付全额费用，即使是在紧急情况下。那些甚至连食物或干净衣服都买不起的朋友们根本无法获得医疗关注。

data.name: The smallest gift -- like lunch or a hot shower -- can start a person on the road to new life.
data.value: 最普通的礼物，可能是一顿午餐或一次热水澡，都可以让人开始新生

data.name: The surprising true story of Xu and you
data.value: 您和徐波共同的故事

data.name: This means that women who rely on the Renewal Center are surprised and exceptionally grateful for the monthly visits from volunteer doctors and nurses who talk to them one-on-one about healthy living and their individual medical concerns. Groups of three or four professionals from an international hospital bring not only a high standard of care, but genuine compassion and cheer.
data.value: 因此，当了解到志愿医生和护士每个月都会来到日新中心，通过与她们一对一的交流来了解他们的健康状况和医疗问题时，这些无家可归的女性朋友们既吃惊，又感恩。每个月都会有来自国际医院的三四名专业人员来到日新中心。他们不仅提供了高标准的护理服务，更带来了真诚的同情与安慰。

data.name: Through them, your kindness reached Wu Zhiming, who is a Shanghai native but doesn't have a home. She was gushing with thanks for your care and partnership when she said, 'I've learned to value being clean and keeping my body healthy. No one else would treat people like me so well. You are really too good to us. Big thanks to you!'
data.value: 通过这些志愿者的服务，您的善举能够真正的帮助到吴智明等无家可归的女性。虽然是上海本地人，但吴智明依然无家可归。她对您给予的关怀与友善满怀感激：“保持清洁和健康对我来说非常重要。我从没见过有人会对我这么好。您就是我们的大救星。感谢您！”

data.name: Through your help Yao Han has a good job, and his employer has a hard worker.
data.value: 在您的帮助下，姚瀚找到了一份好工作，而他的雇主得到了一位勤劳的员工。

data.name: Today you might find Xu Bo cycling along the Bund with flowers ... or striding into the International Finance Center to deliver a contract ... or hurrying across Yu Garden to Renmin Road where a little girl is waiting for a birthday present from her auntie in Beijing.
data.value: 今天，你可能看到徐波骑车带着一束鲜花奔走在外滩，或大步走进国际金融中心递送一份合同，或穿过豫园来到人民路为一个小女孩送去她远在北京的阿姨给她寄来的生日礼物。

data.name: Wu Zhiming is amazed someone cares enough to help her stay healthy.
data.value: 吴智明吃惊于捐赠者们对她健康状况的关注

data.name: You gave Xu the time and space he needed to find the right job.
data.value: 您为徐波提供了找到合适的工作所需的时间和资源

data.name: You go days without a shower. You start skipping meals. Your clothes get filthy. You have no choice but to sleep in a doorway -- and then have even less of a chance of finding a job. Meng Jia'ou explains that when he first visited, 'I wanted to wash and change clothes, to make my appearance look a little better. I came for the first time last month, and when I changed into clean clothes, my spirit and countenance were much improved. It gives me confidence to look for work.'
data.value: 你可能几天都没办法洗澡，甚至吃不饱肚子，衣服满是污垢。除了露宿街头，你别无选择——而在这之后，你想要找到工作就更是难上加难了。谈到第一次来到日新中心，蒙加藕说：“我想要洗个澡，换身衣服，让自己看起来精神一点。上个月，我第一次来到这里，当我换上干净衣服时，我的精神面貌立刻好了起来。这给了我继续找工作的信心。”

data.name: You provide doctors and nurses for women on the streets
data.value: 您给街头的女性提供了医疗资源

data.name: You've encouraged Xu to earn a living making special deliveries across Shanghai.
data.value: 您的鼓励使徐波可以通过在上海投送特别快递来养活自己

data.name: News
data.value: 简报
